original_text: If a widow has children or grandchildren, then they should take care of her. The children must help their parents or grandparents because they belong to the same family. Their parents helped them, so they need to give them something in return. The children need to learn that important lesson. It is what God's message teaches them to do and it makes God happy.
korean_text: 만일 어떤 과부에게 자녀나 손자들이 있거든 그들로 먼저 자기 집에서 효를 행하여 부모에게 보답하기를 배우게 하라 이것이 하나님 앞에 받으실 만한 것이니라

sentences.original_text: If a widow has children or grandchildren
then they should take care of her
The children must help their parents or grandparents
because they belong to the same family
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그들은 같은 가족에 속하기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: so they need to give them something in return
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 그들에게 무언가 보답해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: The children need to learn that important lesson
sentences.korean_translation: 자녀들은 그 중요한 교훈을 배워야 합니다

sentences.original_text: It is what God's message teaches them to do
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 하나님의 메시지가 그들에게 하라고 가르치는 것입니다
